snippet: Raytheon Co on Monday said it saw bright prospects for continued sales of its Patriot air defense missile systems, citing strong interest among its 13 operator countries in adding a 360-degree AESA radar to their existing systems....
lead_paragraph: Raytheon Co on Monday said it saw bright prospects for continued sales of its Patriot air defense missile systems, citing strong interest among its 13 operator countries in adding a 360-degree AESA radar to their existing systems.

headline.main: Raytheon Upbeat on Prospects for Patriot Air Defense System
headline.print_headline: Raytheon Upbeat on Prospects for Patriot Air Defense System
